data.text: Blow trumpets on Zion Hill,
That will be a very dark and gloomy day;
It is as though the locusts bring flames of fire
The locusts resemble horses,
Leaping over the mountaintops,
When people see them coming,
The locusts climb over walls like soldiers do;
They rush straight ahead
They swarm over the city walls and enter our houses;
It is as though they cause the earth to shake and the sky to tremble.
Yahweh leads this army of countless locusts,
But Yahweh says,
Do not tear your clothes
No one knows [RHQ] if he will change his mind about punishing you
Blow the trumpets on Zion Hill!
Perform the rituals to cause yourselves to be acceptable to Yahweh.
Tell the priests who serve Yahweh to cry between the altar and the entrance to the temple
But Yahweh showed that he was concerned about his people
When the people prayed,
Another army of locusts will come from the north to attack you,
He does wonderful things!
And the wild animals should not be afraid,
You people of Jerusalem,
The ground where you thresh the grain will be covered with grain,
Yahweh said, “I will repay you for everything that was destroyed by those great swarms of locusts
You, my people, will eat until your stomachs are full.
When that happens, you will know that I am always among you,
“Some time later, I will give my Spirit to many [HYP] people.
At that time, I will give my Spirit even to servants, both men and women.
I will do unusual/amazing things on the earth and in the sky.
In the sky, the sun will become dark and the moon will become as red as [MET] blood.
But at that time I will save everyone who worships me.
